title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting 'Open With...' and choosing 'Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open and being edited in a different editor, nothing happens.
EB: The file should open in a new editor with the selected 'Default Text Editor', even if it is already open in a different editor.
SR:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
3. Ensure that the 'scripted resource editor' is the default editor for XML files.
4. Open the 'test.xml' file in the editor.
5. In the Navigator, right click on 'test.xml' and select 'Open With...'-> 'Default Text Editor'.
6. Verify that the 'test.xml' file opens in a new editor with the selected 'Default Text Editor', even if it is already open in the 'scripted resource editor'.
